description: All the things you need to be an A11Y.

bookmarks.context: Doesn't cover many of our use cases yet, but the web components bits are interesting to this curator.

steps.name: Design Systems

steps.objective: Web pages and applications have distinct accessibility challenges.

steps.name: MS Office
steps.objective: The MS Office suite of applications including Word, Excel, etc.

steps.name: Performance
steps.objective: Performance is an accessibility issue. If people can't access the content in the first place, other optimizations won't matter.
